meanings.definition: A chemical compound consisting of two ester groups linked by a carbon-carbon bond.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the depside under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The depside was used in the experiment to test its properties.
meanings.sent3: The depside molecule was so tiny, it felt like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: Her love for chemistry was like a depside bond, strong and unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The depside structure resembled a tiny bridge connecting two molecules.

meanings.definition: To form a depside compound through esterification.
meanings.sent1: She carefully depsided the compounds to create a new substance.
meanings.sent2: The students depside compounds in the lab for their project.
meanings.sent3: The chef depsided the ingredients together to make a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship depsided over time, becoming inseparable.
meanings.sent5: The artist depsided colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
